0.name: fifi
0.dialogue: My school is the only one that isn't off because of the cuarintine

1.name: fifi
1.dialogue: Screw them, there are already over a hundred dead in my state alone. i don't want to be a fucking statistic.

2.name: fifi
2.dialogue: But i'll probably lose some classes

3.name: fifi
3.dialogue: i just need to take my mind off these things, i'll go with old man snowball, he always clears my mind up

5.name: snowball
5.dialogue: well hello fifi, What brings you here so early, usually you don't come till late in the evening

6.name: fifi
6.dialogue: I didn't feel up for school today

7.name: fifi
7.dialogue: i wanted to finally hear the story about how you met your baby here

8.name: snowball
8.dialogue: Aye, this old train has watched over me well

9.name: snowball
9.dialogue: Okay, here goes the story, but it puts me sentimental, so listen closely the first time
